mapper.select: select slideshow_good_code goodCode, slideshow_route slideshowRoute from t_sys_slideshow where is_delete = 0 and slideshow_state = 1 and str_to_date(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_start and date_stop >= str_to_date(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') order by slideshow_sort

select h.good_code, g.good_name, g.pictureUrl, g.sell_price, h.hot_sort from t_sys_hot_good h left join t_sys_goods g on h.good_code = g.good_code where g.is_delete = 0 and h.is_delete = 0 order by h.hot_sort
select dict_value from t_dictionary where dict_code = 'showNumber'
